title: Carvacrol and thymol effect in vapor phase on Escherichia coli and Salmonella serovar Typhimurium growth inoculated in a fresh salad
content:
Publication date: 15 May 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 9

Author(s): Teresa Soledad Cid-Pérez, Ricardo Munguía-Pérez, Guadalupe Virginia Nevárez-Moorillón, Carlos Enrique Ochoa-Velasco, Addí Rhode Navarro-Cruz, Raúl Avila-Sosa
